title: Awesome 2 Bed 1 Bath in North Bend Community!!
posting_body: Awesome 2 Bed 1 Bath in North Bend Community!!
475 E North Bend Way - Unit 19 | North Bend, WA 98045
Don't miss out on this excellent 2 Bed, 1.5 Bath, 900 square foot, two-level - Townhome Style Unit in Downtown North Bend!
Close to the Snoqualmie Valley Trail, Snoqualmie River Walk, Si View Park & Pool, this community is your ideal next rental!
North Bend is full of year-round activities include hiking, biking, fishing, kayaking, climbing, and skiing.
Near the Snoqualmie River and surrounded by stunning views and wildlife North Bends beauty is extraordinary!
Along with being so close to great shopping, restaurants, Factory Outlet Mall, Snoqualmie Ridge, and Snoqualmie Casino!
Pets accepted on a case-by-case basis with additional deposit(s) and/or pet rent
Tenant is responsible for all utilities (W/S/G separately metered).
*$49 non-refundable application fee per applicant age 18 and older.
Key Words: North Bend, Mount Si, Downtown, Eastside, Snoqualmie, Lakeshore.
Fireplace and view of Mt Si off bedroom patio
